title: PPTD
name: Project Plant Test Date
definition: Identifies the pre negotiated plant test date for the start of overall testing of the service requested on this ASR.
fieldNotes: Examples of the use of this field would be relatin g multiple Access Service Requests, previousl y  negotiated orders, etc.
The provider may initiate the pro j ect identification and provide this to the customer who will populate the field when submitting an ASR.
The Pro j ect Number must be entered by the ne w and the former customers on "N" and "D" coordinated conversion orders.
validEntries: U.S. Standard  Metric Format  T wo Digit Month  ( 01-12)  T wo Digit Century  ( 00-99)  T wo Digit Day  ( 01-31)  T wo Digit Year  ( 00-99)  T wo Digit Century  ( 00-99)  T wo Digit Month  ( 01-12)  T wo Digit Year  ( 00-99)  T wo Digit Day  ( 01-31)
validEntryNotes:
Indicates the time zone and time or time zone and w indow of time when the service should be connected, disconnected or coordinated. 
When this field is populated in con j unction with the CB TEL NO field, a specific time of day including the hour or hour and minute is required.
usageNotes: Optional when the PROJECT field is populated, otherwise prohibited.
